comment: Great professor. Makes class enjoyable with all his funny references. Ties it into real world stuff too. Free response tests, but if you study what he said, you should get an A. Highly recommend Gray. You will learn a lot.
Everything above is true. Very easy going and a very easy A. Take him.

Professor Gray was great,  the way the class is set up its an easy A.  70% of grade is fourteen 10 question quizes each week and you get to drop 3. 15% is attempting 12 out of 15 learn smart modules. and 15% is an easy group project.  He has been CEO of non profits his whole career so comes with a lot of knowledge.  you'd be stupid not to Take him
Very easy. Has 10 question test/quizzes every week but not hard at all. One easy group project. Drops lowest 3 test/quiz grades. In other words, want an A? TAKE HIM.

Esay teacher ever! You don't have to come to the class and still make an A. EASY A!!! You don't have to read the book at all. Every week he gives a quiz with 10 questions. But they are easy, you just have to know the definitions from the book. I fyou read 1 hour before the quiz you will still make 100. He drops 3 lowest quizzes.
